Viewing the results and postprocessing saved waveforms
======================================================

In this section we are going to demonstrate how you can postprocess the 
waveforms generated by the simulator. 
All of the project files can be found in 
`demo/gui/miller/ <../../../demo/gui/miller/>`_

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   
   gui.post.results.rst
   gui.post.measures.rst
   gui.post.waveforms.rst
   gui.post.setup.rst
